Title: Autonomous Vehicle Control
Abstract: A system for automated control of vehicle navigation using advanced sensors and machine learning algorithms to improve safety and efficiency.

Title: AI-Based Financial Forecasting
Abstract: A method leveraging AI to predict financial market trends by analyzing historical data and economic indicators to assist in investment decision-making.

Title: Renewable Energy Storage
Abstract: A novel battery system designed for storing solar energy, with improved efficiency and capacity, to enhance the adoption of renewable energy solutions.

Title: Smart Healthcare Monitoring
Abstract: A device that monitors patient vitals using IoT sensors, providing real-time data to healthcare providers for early diagnosis and treatment.

Title: Blockchain for Supply Chains
Abstract: A blockchain framework for improving supply chain transparency and traceability, ensuring secure and efficient transactions among stakeholders.
